message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that has the potential to be incredibly valuable. While I can't disclose the exact details, I assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me. I'm confident that it will be even more valuable to the right person.  I'm willing to let it go for $1000000. This is a one-time offer, so consider it carefully. Let me know your decision.
